item.title: Youtube editing for business documentary channel - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for a editor for a faceless youtube channel that's publishing documentary-style videos about business leaders and their stories.

The first video is about Atlassian founder Mike Cannon-Brookes. The text has 1200 words that a narrator reads in 8 minutes. We also have 11 podcast snippets (6 minutes) that must be edited in the video. Total length will be 14 minutes.

NOTE: if you want to apply, please send me the following
1. One example of your most relevant previous work
2. An edit of the first 1:03 minutes (AI audio attached and text below)

I expect you to use elements like:
1. Media articles with highlighted text
2. Snippets from interviews that are recorded on video
3. text jumping into the screen
4. Fragments from popular movies and TV series about business: e.g. TV series Silicon Valley, Billions, and Succession and movies Wall Street, The Social Network, Wolf of Wall Street, Margin Call, The Big Short
5. Screenshots of tweets published by Mike
6. stock video footage that gives an indication of time, e.g. when we talk about young years
7. Shots of increasing stock valuations
8. Clips from news broadcasts to give historical context
9. Company logos and branding elements
10. Product demos or advertisements: Jira and Confluence

Intro text
Meet Mike Cannon-Brookes: the outspoken Aussie tech maverick who built a $162 billion software empire from the ground up. As the co-founder of Atlassian, he’s behind software giants like Jira and Confluence that revolutionized how tech companies operate. But Cannon-Brookes isn’t just a tech entrepreneur; he's a rebel with a cause, shaking up the status quo.
Mike’s ambitions stretch far beyond software. He famously challenged Elon Musk to solve South Australia's energy crisis with Tesla batteries and has poured billions into climate tech. His bold $8 billion takeover bid for Australia’s biggest energy provider, AGL, aimed to force them to phase out coal faster.
Cannon-Brookes also stormed the sports world, becoming a co-owner of the South Sydney Rabbitohs and the first Aussie to hold a stake in the NBA’s Utah Jazz. But success didn’t come easy. This is the gripping story of how Mike Cannon-Brookes battled obstacles and naysayers to become a global powerhouse.


Budget: $60
